body:
Hello fellow avicans! I have recently been thinking of a really cool map idea, that I thought could seriously become a real map. So here is the idea:

Remember the map Ravanged? Remember how everyone loved it so much? Well I have been thinking of a map design related to what Ravanged looked like. Does anyone know about Trench warfare? Well in WW1, soldiers dug deep,narrow holes in the ground, and basically did all their fighting from there. I thought that it would be cool if avicus had a WW1 themed map. Basically, the map would have two sides, the Allies, and the Axis. the two sides would be separated by a huge gap, filled with water. Then there will be the trenches. Each trench could have some sort of TNT cannon, and a chest full of red stone materials. The map would allow block placing, and the monuments could be placed in towers, or in underground trenches.. I just thought this would be a cool idea for the map dev's to ponder upon! Hope you guys take this idea in to consideration for a future map!

-Senor
body_tagged:

title: [Idea] Map idea!

replies.body: This, I really like this idea. I was actually working on something very similar to this, but I had not thought about trenches. It was going to be a huge battlefield like you described, with the monuments in towers, but you would kind of parachute into the battle. I might have to add trenches and TNT cannons too, if that's fine.
replies.body_tagged: This, I really like this idea. I was actually working on something very similar to this, but I had not thought about trenches. It was going to be a huge battlefield like you described, with the monuments in towers, but you would kind of parachute into the battle. I might have to add trenches and TNT cannons too, if that's fine.

replies.body:
I love this idea but one thing: People (particularly those with relatives who fought in the war) could be easily offended by this.
Apart from that, I think that a good idea would be to have maybe 10 or 11 different trenches, so you can lose/gain ground.
replies.body_tagged:
I love this idea but one thing: People (particularly those with relatives who fought in the war) could be easily offended by this.
Apart from that, I think that a good idea would be to have maybe 10 or 11 different trenches, so you can lose/gain ground.

replies.body: Well, I wasn't going to use historical names for that reason. I really like your gain/loose ground idea. Will do. Will probably find a way to include your guys' names in it for ideas. :)
replies.body_tagged: Well, I wasn't going to use historical names for that reason. I really like your gain/loose ground idea. Will do. Will probably find a way to include your guys' names in it for ideas. :)
